## Trustee type

Abstract base class for the data of "Trustees": the data of Users or Groups.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Trustee = SystemWideObject & {
    Description?: string;
    GroupMemberships?: Array<GroupMembership>;
    IsPredefined?: boolean;
};
```
